traits.content: Spends a lot of time online browsing sports cars.
Loves hiking for hours with headphones on.
Makes decisions in life based on astrology.
Despises working 9 to 5, wishes they'd become a game developer.
Believes that society should return to the traditional, patriarchal model.
Proudly paints miniatures in spare time.
Has fears of being surveillanced by the government.
Commutes to work for two hours each day.
Vocal member of the Ecologist NGO.
Quotes Adam Smith often, just to highlight his economic background.
